triggers.name: FCF trajectory to breakeven
triggers.formula: FCF_3mo_avg = avg(OperatingCashFlow - Capex) over last 3 months; TrajectoryGap = FCF_3mo_avg - TargetFCF_3mo_avg(month_index)
triggers.measurement_window: Trailing 3-month average, evaluated monthly at close
action_if_pass: Allow planned growth investments within gated budget bands
Maintain hiring plan for roles already pre-approved by gate
action_if_fail: Immediate spend containment: freeze non-essential hiring and backfills
Reduce discretionary spend 10–20% next month (tools/contractors/marketing experiments)
Re-forecast within 5 business days; escalate to Board chair if two consecutive fails
triggers.variance_notes: Use bands not point targets; allow seasonality and billing swings; reconcile with working capital movements

triggers.name: EBITDA trajectory to breakeven (alternate definition)
triggers.formula: EBITDA_3mo_avg = avg(Revenue - COGS - Opex excl D&A) over last 3 months; TrajectoryGap = EBITDA_3mo_avg - TargetEBITDA_3mo_avg(month_index)
triggers.measurement_window: Trailing 3-month average, evaluated monthly at close
action_if_pass: Permit growth experiments if other guardrails pass
Continue roadmap items classified as retention-critical
action_if_fail: Trigger cost actions: pause low-ROI programs; reallocate to retention and proven channels
Implement approval gate for any new vendor spend >$5k/month
triggers.variance_notes: EBITDA ignores working capital; pair with cash triggers (T4/T5) to avoid cash surprises

triggers.name: Rule of 40 guardrail (growth narrative)
action_if_pass: Use Ro40 in external narrative and board reporting as primary efficiency signal
action_if_fail: Shift emphasis to efficiency story; cut/reshape lowest ROI acquisition spend
Mandate pricing/packaging review and discount controls within 30 days
triggers.variance_notes: Bands reflect market variability; select benchmark band by segment and growth stage

triggers.name: Cash runway floor
triggers.measurement_window: Trailing 3-month burn average, evaluated weekly and monthly
action_if_pass: Proceed with phased plan; keep optionality for selective investment
action_if_fail: Activate defensive plan: hiring freeze, renegotiate major vendors, cut discretionary spend 15–25%
Consider financing/strategic options exploration if fails for 4 consecutive weeks
triggers.variance_notes: Runway depends on burn volatility; use 3-month avg and also a high-burn stress case (+20–30%)

triggers.name: NRR floor (do-not-break retention)
triggers.measurement_window: Monthly cohort-based, evaluated monthly; also 3-month rolling average
action_if_pass: Maintain planned product/customer success investments tied to retention
action_if_fail: Protect CS/product capacity; pause risky changes; run churn war-room within 7 days
Reallocate GTM spend from new logo to retention until back above 100–105%
triggers.variance_notes: NRR varies by segment; thresholds should be calibrated to historical distribution

triggers.name: Pipeline coverage for next-quarter bookings
triggers.measurement_window: Weekly snapshot; evaluate weekly trend (4-week moving average)
action_if_pass: Maintain demand gen and SDR capacity; focus on conversion improvements
action_if_fail: Stop unproven channels; redirect to pipeline creation with best historical ROI
Revise bookings target or re-segment focus within 2 weeks
triggers.variance_notes: Coverage needed depends on win rates and cycle length; calibrate quarterly

triggers.name: CAC payback discipline
triggers.measurement_window: Quarterly cohort-based; updated monthly with trailing 3-month smoothing
action_if_pass: Allow scaling of efficient segments/channels within gate
action_if_fail: Reduce acquisition spend 10–30% in failing segments; tighten ICP and qualification
Enforce discount ceilings and pricing governance immediately
triggers.variance_notes: Payback is lagging; pair with leading indicators (conversion rates, ASP, sales cycle)

triggers.name: Gross margin floor
action_if_pass: Continue investments; pursue infra optimization roadmap
action_if_fail: Launch COGS taskforce: cloud commitments, arch efficiency, support cost review
Pause low-margin offerings/custom deals unless approved by CFO
triggers.variance_notes: Account for usage spikes and one-time credits; normalize where appropriate

breakeven_in_12_months.description: Monthly target path for EBITDA or FCF to reach >=0 by month 12 using bands, not point targets
